Atlanta.St. Charles-Greenwood:
Charles Hamar Delevingne (born 25 June 1949) is an English property developer and the father of the models Cara and Poppy Delevingne. He is the grandson of the lawyer and politician Hamar Greenwood, 1st Viscount Greenwood.


== Early life ==
Charles Delevingne was born on 25 June 1949 to Edward Dudley Delevingne, a British stockbroker and ex-husband of Countess Felicia Gizycki (daughter of American publishing heiress Cissy Patterson), and the Hon.
